GDevelop is an open-source game creator,: GDevelop is an open-source game creator, tailored for fast and intuitive game making.
Add ads to your game with AdMob: Add ads to your game with AdMob
Use AdMob in your GDevelop games to disp: Use AdMob in your GDevelop games to display ads and reward videos to your players
Go to [AdMob website](https://www.google: Go to [AdMob website](https://www.google.com/admob/) and create an account. Then, create a new app from the Admob interface and an ad unit. Note the identifiers for both the app and the ad unit, as they will be used in your game.
In GDevelop, open the properties of your: In GDevelop, open the properties of your game and paste the AdMob **app id**. This will be identified to use your application for AdMob to deliver ads.
Add events in your game to load and show: Add events in your game to load and show the ad when needed (this can be when a level is successfully completed for example). Paste in the parameters of the action the ad unit identifier. You can also enter "test" for loading a test ad.
You can test and publish your game on An: You can test and publish your game on Android directly from GDevelop. In the editor, open your game and then the Export window. Choose Android, click on Export and wait a few minutes.
How to publish to Android in one click: How to publish to Android in one click

Create custom behaviors for your game ob: Create custom behaviors for your game objects in GDevelop
In a few clicks, you can create new beha: In a few clicks, you can create new behaviors for your game objects - using events or JavaScript.
Flash is a custom behavior that is creat: Flash is a custom behavior that is created directly from GDevelop - allowing an object to blink
Create custom behaviors - directly from: Create custom behaviors - directly from GDevelop editor
GDevelop allows you to create new behavi: GDevelop allows you to create new behaviors, using the same events as the ones that you're using to create the rules of your game.
Want enemies to automatically follow the: Want enemies to automatically follow the player?
Want some rockets to target the player?: Want some rockets to target the player?
Want enemies and the players to have hea: Want enemies and the players to have health and take damage?
Behaviors can be created for any kind of: Behaviors can be created for any kind of object, and you can create custom actions and conditions associated to your new behavior.
An action is exposed by the behavior, an: An action is exposed by the behavior, and can be used like any other action in the events
Read the documentation about custom beha: Read the documentation about custom behaviors
Import new behaviors, created by the GDe: Import new behaviors, created by the GDevelop community
Behaviors, as well as extensions, can be: Behaviors, as well as extensions, can be shared between projects. You can **export and import** them in a few clicks. If your behavior is generic and reusable in multiple games, you can even submit it to be integrated in the growing list of custom behaviors shared by the community.
Create your game by assembling behaviors: Create your game by assembling behaviors
Progressively create custom behaviors fo: Progressively create custom behaviors for objects in your game
ideal for large games and keeping simple: ideal for large games and keeping simple events.
Search for new behaviors in the list of: Search for new behaviors in the list of behaviors shared by the community

Install new extensions in GDevelop and s: Install new extensions in GDevelop and share yours
Install new extensions and share them: Install new extensions and share them
Search and add new features to your game: Search and add new features to your game in a few clicks.
Search in the library of extensions, rea: Search in the library of extensions, ready to be installed in one click
Directly from the editor, you can explor: Directly from the editor, you can explore the **online library of extensions** (also called a "package manager" or an "extension store"). Extensions can bring *new behaviors* for your game objects, or *actions, conditions* or expressions that are ready to use in events.
**Featured extensions** are peer reviewe: **Featured extensions** are peer reviewed. They are ideal to add new features at a fast pace to your game, making both prototyping of new games a very quick process and allowing larger games to be constructed by assembling extensions.
Export your own extensions and share the: Export your own extensions and share them
All extensions can be exported to a file: All extensions can be exported to a file. They can easily be shared and integrated to another project. Better, if you have created a useful extension, you can submit it to be integrated to the library of [open-source, community extensions](https://github.com/4ian/GDevelop-extensions).
As extensions are constructed using the: As extensions are constructed using the intuitive GDevelop events sheets, they can be composed of events, [JavaScript or a mix of both](/javascript-game-engine).
How to start a new extension: How to start a new extension
Extensions can provide new behaviors tha: Extensions can provide new behaviors that can be added to your game objects.
Make Facebook Instant Games with GDevelo: Make Facebook Instant Games with GDevelop - publish your games on Messenger
Export your game to iOS (with [PhoneGap: Export your game to iOS (with [PhoneGap Build or Cordova](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/publishing/android_and_ios_with_cordova)).
Display [ads and reward videos](/ads-in-: Display [ads and reward videos](/ads-in-your-game-with-admob) to your players using [AdMob](/ads-in-your-game-with-admob).
**Tiled sprites**, to create mosaics, fl: **Tiled sprites**, to create mosaics, floors and repeating patterns
Draw custom shapes on screen with **Shap: Draw custom shapes on screen with **Shape Painters**
support multiple screen sizes by ensurin: support multiple screen sizes by ensuring controls stay at the right position
smoothly animate object positions, sizes: smoothly animate object positions, sizes, opacity and colors
Save player data in the browser storage: Save player data in the browser storage or on their devices
create effects and customize them in a f: create effects and customize them in a few clicks
Communicate with external websites or se: Communicate with external websites or services using HTTP requests.
Create reusable **functions** using even: Create reusable **functions** using events, that can be used as actions, conditions or expressions in your game
a powerful feature never seen in other g: a powerful feature never seen in other game creation tools.
Manipulate variables with arbitrary comp: Manipulate variables with arbitrary complex structures, with support for reading/writing JSON.
You can [use JavaScript to code](/javasc: You can [use JavaScript to code](/javascript-game-engine) parts of your game
use it for a few functions, to write ext: use it for a few functions, to write extensions or the majority of your game.
Display ads in your game with [AdMob](/a: Display ads in your game with [AdMob](/ads-in-your-game-with-admob) or link to products from your [Shopify shop](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/all-features/shopify).
Search and [install new features with ex: Search and [install new features with extensions](/extensions-and-sharing), built by the community
get new, ready to use features for your: get new, ready to use features for your game in a few clicks
Imagining and creating the rules of your: Imagining and creating the rules of your game do not imply to learn the syntax of a complex programming language. The events editor displays a sheet of events: each events is composed of conditions and actions. When conditions are fulfilled, actions are run. It's that simple.
Resources editor, sprite editor and soun: Resources editor, sprite editor and sound effect generator
GDevelop comes bundled with free assets: GDevelop comes bundled with free assets to get you started! To quickly prototype and create your own assets, GDevelop is also bundled with a powerful pixel art editor called Piskel. You can also create sound effect in a single click using the integrated sound generator. It's perfect for [game jams](/game-jams/)!
GDevelop is a perfect fit for quickly ma: GDevelop is a perfect fit for quickly making games during game jams.
GDevelop is bundled with **Piskel**, a s: GDevelop is bundled with **Piskel**, a sprite editor that is perfect to quickly draw your sprites and for pixel-art.
Read more about making 8-bit and pixelar: Read more about making 8-bit and pixelart games
Generate sounds effects in one click: Generate sounds effects in one click
GDevelop has an integrated sound effect: GDevelop has an integrated sound effect generator, **Jfxr**. You can create sounds effects like explosions, jump, coins, power ups in a single click and customize them as you wish.
Read about all features available in GDe: Read about all features available in GDevelop
GDevelop for Game studios, indies and Ed: GDevelop for Game studios, indies and Education
GDevelop is a fast and flexible game eng: GDevelop is a fast and flexible game engine that can be used for different use cases.
GDevelop is a lightweight game engine, c: GDevelop is a lightweight game engine, carefully designed and open-source. The unique design of the editor has been explained during [talks in international conferences](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6La7jSCnYyk).
MIT license: extend and contribute to th: MIT license: extend and contribute to the engine source code
Adaptable editor based on JavaScript, Re: Adaptable editor based on JavaScript, React.js and WebAssembly
Integrate GDevelop in your team, use eve: Integrate GDevelop in your team, use events or JavaScript according to your needs
Get game designers, artists and develope: Get game designers, artists and developers to work on the same environment
Game projects are human readable and sup: Game projects are human readable and support version control systems like Git or Mercurial
Accessible and easy to learn, GDevelop i: Accessible and easy to learn, GDevelop is ideal for indie game developers. You'll be able to quickly start a game and iterate by using events, behaviors and new extensions.
Free to use: download GDevelop and start: Free to use: download GDevelop and start making a game today
Integrated editors allowing to make game: Integrated editors allowing to make game assets directly from GDevelop
Super fast prototyping with open-source: Super fast prototyping with open-source community extensions and behaviors
Custom behaviors make your game logic re: Custom behaviors make your game logic reusable and shareable
Teaching game creation or programming to: Teaching game creation or programming to kids or students? GDevelop has been used by dozens of schools, universities and bootcamp programs for all ages.
Learn more about GDevelop and education: Learn more about GDevelop and education

GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platfo: GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platform game engine designed for everyone - it's extensible, fast and easy to learn.
Events: game creation, intuitive for all: Events: game creation, intuitive for all
GDevelop takes visual programming to the: GDevelop takes visual programming to the next step, allowing you to add [ready-made behaviors](/features) to your game objects and [make new behaviors](/custom-behaviors) using these intuitive, easy to learn events.
Export your game anywhere, in one click: Export your game anywhere, in one click
Express your small and big ideas: you ca: Express your small and big ideas: you can prototype new features on your games in minutes, and refine them without limits. [Making games](/games-showcase) has never been so easy and fast, with [the visual editors](/game-editors) provided by GDevelop.
There either has been an error or you ca: There either has been an error or you cancelled the subscription. If you want to get a subscription to support GDevelop and unlock online services, try again to choose one from GDevelop (*My Profile* menu).
As an open-source software, GDevelop req: As an open-source software, GDevelop requires time and money to be developed and sustainable. Thanks for your contribution! If you want to get more involved, you can also [read all the ways](/contribute) to contribute to GDevelop ecosystem.
You can now **go back to GDevelop** to u: You can now **go back to GDevelop** to use the additional online exports and services.
